## Ingredients

* 1.5 pounds of hamburger
* 3/4 cup of ketchup
* 3 Tbsp brown sugar
* 1 tsp of mustard
* 2 Tbsp of bbq sauce

## Directions

* Cook hamburger
* Mix condiments together
* Throw condiments in with hamburger, stir until heated through.
* Serve on buns

Adapted from https://www.eatingonadime.com/sloppy-joes-recipe/
